"Guiden": "Looks like you've installed a Special Ability. You should now notice an increase to your Power Level while equipping that gear."
"There are myriad Special Abilities, with yet more effects."
"Will you augment your strengths, or perhaps offset your shortcomings? Try out different customizations to see what works for you."
"At times, trial and error is necessary. Don't be afraid of making mistakes. Take them and learn from them."
